entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 6:42 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
